verbs.description: [V: should] us have domestic terrorism law the package bombs sent to democrats across the county and the killings of jews at a pittsburgh synagogue may seem like clear - cut cases of terrorism but the suspects will almost certainly never face terrorism robert bowers attorney united states department of justice united states department of state united states cesar sayoc ku klux klan general rod rosenstein fbi state department pittsburgh synagogue dylann roof karen joy greenberg mary mccord terrorism joshua zive federal bureau of investigation murder center on national security fbi agents association obama administration director president isis band fordham university school of law donald trump karen greenberg isis official justice department fordham university law school south carolina
